openconsensus.stats

Interface StatsRecorder


  • @ThreadSafe
public interface StatsRecorder
    Provides methods to record stats against tags.
    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Measure.Builder measureBuilder(String name)
      Returns a new builder for a Measure.
      void record(List<Measurement> measurements)
      Records all given measurements, with the current Tagger.getCurrentTagMap().
      void record(List<Measurement> measurements, TagMap tags)
      Records all given measurements, with an explicit TagMap.
      void record(List<Measurement> measurements, TagMap tags, SpanContext spanContext)
      Records all given measurements, with an explicit TagMap.

    • Method Detail

      • measureBuilder

        Measure.Builder measureBuilder(String name)
        Returns a new builder for a Measure.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of measure, as a String. Should be a ASCII string with a length no greater than 255 characters.
        Returns:
        a new builder for a Measure.
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • record

        void record(List<Measurement> measurements)
        Records all given measurements, with the current Tagger.getCurrentTagMap().
        Parameters:
        measurements - the list of Measurements to record.
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • record

        void record(List<Measurement> measurements,
            TagMap tags)
        Records all given measurements, with an explicit TagMap.
        Parameters:
        measurements - the list of Measurements to record.
        tags - the tags associated with the measurements.
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • record

        void record(List<Measurement> measurements,
            TagMap tags,
            SpanContext spanContext)
        Records all given measurements, with an explicit TagMap. These measurements are associated with the given SpanContext.
        Parameters:
        measurements - the list of Measurements to record.
        tags - the tags associated with the measurements.
        spanContext - the SpanContext that identifies the Span for which the measurements are associated with.
        Since:
        0.1.0
